scripts.dev:test: npm run test:setup && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd app && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.clean: rm -rf app/dist app/node_modules server/dist server/node_modules node_modules
scripts.lint: cd app && npm run lint && cd ../server && npm run lint
scripts.test: cd app && npm run test && cd ../server && npm run test
